channel.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)
channel.description: Live action short series [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckSoTTjdpvs&feature=g-user[/url] Looks familiar :stuck_out_tongue: "Special Thanks : The Black Mesa Source Dev Team, Carlos "cman2k" Montero and all the 3d artists and sound designers."

Also, may I point out that your costumes were amazing? That security guard looked great, exactly like the ones in the game.

item.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description:
Totaly Agree with you M-Man !!
That is exactly my idea. For me the stories of Freeman, Calhoun and Shepard are already written, because we played them.
So my idea is to show them in quick apparitions, following other black mesa peoples.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)

item.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
That is by far the only fan film set during the original game I’ve actually enjoyed.

Well done.

I’d share a couple of criticisms but they are only fueled by your no doubt tiny budget.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)

item.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)
item.dc:creator: M-Man
item.description:
I liked how you used Freeman in the film. My idea of a Half Life movie has always been several characters following the actions of Gordon, therefore allowing him to remain a silent character. Gordon might not even make a full appearence, but the movie would still be about him. With some good cinematography a feature film like that could be amazing.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)

item.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description:
Hey Guys, Thank you very much

I’m the director of this film and yes the director of BMS gave me the authorization to use some sounds.

I would like to make the next one from the HECU marines point of view

item.title: Half-Life: Chain Reaction - Part 1 (Machinima Interactive Film Festival)
item.dc:creator: yrr
item.description:
wow looks awesome… I also liked the Ego-Perspective which was - unlike Doom - not complete shit.

In fact I would love a HL-Movie in that kind of Style, perhaps a little bit less action and more horror but great shooting, acting and video editing
